name: Ronald D. WEAVER, Petitioner, v. John E. STRINE and Robert Holland, Respondents

parties: Ronald D. WEAVER, Petitioner, v. John E. STRINE and Robert Holland, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 5th day of May, 1998, the above-captioned Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The Order of the Commonwealth Court is VACATED pursuant to Jacobs v. Halloran, 1998 WL 149478, — Pa. -, — A.2d - (Pa.1998), and the matter is REMANDED to the court of common pleas for proceedings consistent with our Jacobs decision.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
709 A.2d 900
Ronald D. WEAVER, Petitioner, v. John E. STRINE and Robert Holland, Respondents.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 5, 1998.
